price: Monya wͻn ho anigyeε nso wͻ berε a mode wͻn reba fie anwummerε ne εberε a mode wͻn rekͻ adidie anͻpa.
arabic: وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا جَمَالٌ حِينَ تُرِيحُونَ وَحِينَ تَسۡرَحُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walakum fīhā jamālun ḥīna turīḥūna waḥīna tasraḥūna
